data.event: Harvey was founded in 1891 by Christian leader Turlington W. Harvey, a close associate of Dwight Moody, the founder of the Moody Bible Institute in Chicago.

event.title: saw its greatest growth during the 1950s

data.event: The city saw its greatest growth during the 1950s, but by the 1990s it was losing population and its economy was in decline.
The city saw its greatest growth during the 1950s, but by the 1990s it was losing population and its economy was in decline.
